title: Interior minister calls on PM, submits report over security situation in Sindh
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 2 (APP): Minister for Interior Sheikh Rasheed Ahmad Wednesday called upon Prime Minister Imran Khan and submitted a report over security situation in Sindh province.
The interior minister also apprised him about his visit to Karachi.
Sheikh Rasheed also apprised the prime minister about his recent visit to Kuwait and said that issuance of Kuwaiti visas to Pakistanis after a gap of ten years was a big diplomatic success.
The prime minister felicitated the minister on his successful visit to Kuwait and expressed gratitude to the Kuwaiti leadership and the government over resolution of the issue of visas.
